fields.text: Welcome to KittyHawk, where we unite mission, aircraft, and data to empower safe and effective drone operations.
For assistance with flight planning and mission management, press [INDEX].
For help creating and configuring a new flight mission, press [INDEX].
Please hold for a mission planning specialist. We appreciate your patience.
For data analytics and reporting on your drone operations, press [INDEX].
Please hold for our data analytics team. Your expertise matters to us.
For technical support with your drone hardware or software, press [INDEX].
For hardware setup and maintenance support, press [INDEX].
Please hold for a hardware support technician. We’ll be right with you.
For software and platform troubleshooting, press [INDEX].
Please hold for our software support team. Thank you for your patience.
